channel.title: Real quick question on npc spawning from autospawn
channel.description: When you kill a autospawn npc and when it 'respawns' all npcs reset position to south which ticks me off. Anyone know were does this happen or weres that dam timer than spawns em like 15 seconds later after it died :| yes ive tried lots of times ;)

item.title: Real quick question on npc spawning from autospawn
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

3rd variable in npc.cfg is the supposibly combat lvl >_>? or are you talking about npc.java?

Read full topic
item.source: Real quick question on npc spawning from autospawn
